1.t: (Muhammad), have We not comforted your heart,

3.t: which had been a heavy weight upon your back

4.t: and granted you an exalted reputation?

5.t: After every difficulty there is relief.

6.t: Certainly, after every difficulty there comes relief.

7.t: When you are free from (your obligations), strive hard (to worship God)

8.t: and be devoted to your Lord's service.
